content.title: Rule of 6s
content.description: Clinical criteria for AV fistula maturation

key_concepts.details: A mature fistula should have: Flow >600 mL/min, Diameter >6 mm, Depth <6 mm from skin
Assessment at 4-6 weeks post-creation; mature fistulas ready for use at 6 weeks-3 months
Palpable thrill, easily compressible, visible outflow vein
Occurs in 20-60%; may require intervention (angioplasty, revision)

content.clinical_significance: Simple clinical criteria to assess fistula readiness for use
